item.title: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese calls royal commission into antisemitism and social cohesion after Bondi attac
item.description: <p>Anthony Albanese has buckled after weeks of mounting pressure and opened a Commonwealth royal commission after the Bondi Beach terrorist attack.</p>

item.title: Lives 'likely to be lost' if residents don't evacuate
